alert.note: Alert for Miami (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 31 at 3:00PM CDT until June 02 at 1:21PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...The Flood Warning continues for the following rivers in Kansas... Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie affecting Miami County. This product along with additional weather and stream information is available at www.weather.gov/kc/. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM LATE TONIGHT TO EARLY THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Marais Des Cygnes River at Osawatomie. * WHEN...From late tonight to early Thursday afternoon. * IMPACTS...At 28.0 feet, Low-lying areas along the river begin to flood. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:00 PM CDT Tuesday the stage was 23.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage just after midnight tonight to a crest of 28.4 feet tomorrow morning. It will then fall below flood stage early tomorrow afternoon. - Flood stage is 28.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Fld Obs Forecasts Location Stg Stg Day/Time Tue Wed Wed 7pm 7am 7pm Marais Des Cygnes River Osawatomie 28.0 23.6 Tue 2pm 26.6 28.4 26.4 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
